channel.title: Tags on Home

item.title: Starting a Blog
item.description: I wasn’t sure of starting a blog at first. I am a back-end developer. Any work I have done on CSS, JS or HTML was in college days. I thought it would be easy if I can publish blogs writing markdown files. Few things that I was concerned about: Capital — I wanted the investment to be minimum. Didn’t wanted to manage a server or traffic on the site.
